synopsis.text:
Nanjoâ€™s obsession with Izumi Takuto, a budding soccer player, forms the crux of this intense boy-love anime. As Nanjo, a renowned rockstar, pulls out all stops to keep Izumi by his side, the latter grapples with his burgeoning feelings and aspirations to play professional soccer in Italy. Their tumultuous relationship is marred by Nanjo's emotional instability and Izumi's career opportunities, leading to a critical juncture where Izumi must make a life-altering decision.

Amidst the chaos, an unexpected traffic accident leaves Nanjo in a coma, further complicating their already strained relationship. As Izumi navigates the challenging terrain of love and career, a tragic event rocks their circle, forcing him to reassess his priorities. Will their love withstand the trials and tribulations, or will it crumble under the weight of their individual dreams and desires? Only time will tell if they can find happiness together.
